snippet: Comedian Bill Cosby, in an interview that aired on Saturday, declined to answer questions by a National Public Radio journalist about accusations of sexual assault that resurfaced in recent weeks....

headline.print_headline: Cosby Declines to Answer Questions About Sex Assault Accusations
headline.main: Cosby Declines to Answer Questions About Sex Assault Accusations

lead_paragraph: Comedian Bill Cosby, in an interview that aired on Saturday, declined to answer questions by a National Public Radio journalist about accusations of sexual assault that resurfaced in recent weeks.
